channel.title: Neural Networks on automato.farm
channel.description: Recent content in Neural Networks on automato.farm

item.title: traiNNing cards
item.description: Recently we hear a lot about Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Neural Networks as being a revolutionary way for computers and machines in general to sense and recognize the world around them. Security cameras, home robots and other “intelligent” machines will have to recognize not only us but objects, pets and other inhabitants of our life with a training process that is hidden and done digitally through a generic set of images gathered from the web.
